translation.en: [David Attenborough] Sixty thousand years ago,
humans left Africa for the first time.
Since then, we haven't stopped,
translation.zh: ‎此后 我们就不曾停下脚步

translation.en: traveling to every corner of the Earth.
But our journey is just one of many.
translation.zh: ‎然而人类之旅只是众多旅程之一

translation.en: At any given moment,
billions of animals are on the move.
And the health of our planet depends on it.
translation.zh: ‎而我们星球的健康正有赖于此

translation.en: Migration is the most vital survival strategy.
translation.zh: ‎迁徙是至关重要的生存策略

translation.en: Whether to feed…
to breed…
…or to find a new home.
And it's not without risk.
This series traces extraordinary journeys
in a world that is changing faster than ever.
translation.zh: ‎日新月异的世界中一段段非凡旅程

translation.en: And only now are we beginning to understand
translation.zh: ‎时至今日 我们才开始明白

translation.en: that all life on Earth
depends on the freedom to move.
Every year, this land in Botswana is transformed.
translation.zh:
‎博茨瓦纳的这片土地
‎每年都在发生剧变

translation.en: These scars are the only sign that it was covered by water
translation.zh: ‎就在三个月前 这里还有水体浸润

translation.en: just three months ago.
Then, rich and green.
Now, baked and barren.
This change drives animals to move en masse.
translation.zh: ‎这种改变促使动物们集体行动

translation.en: Cape buffalo are marching across the Kalahari Desert
translation.zh: ‎非洲水牛正在穿越喀拉哈里沙漠

translation.en: towards the last remaining water.
Groups have come together and formed a mega herd.
The largest in Africa.
All are making the same annual pilgrimage
translation.zh: ‎每一年 它们都进行同样的朝圣之旅

translation.en: to one remote marsh.
And others are relying on them to do so.
translation.zh: ‎而其它动物也指望着水牛的湿地之行

translation.en: These lions are buffalo specialists.
translation.zh: ‎这些狮子是猎捕水牛的行家

translation.en: And the mega herd's arrival
is the most important event of their year.
translation.zh: ‎水牛大军的到来是一年中的头等要事

translation.en: For weeks, they've been waiting for the buffalo army.
translation.zh:
‎它们已经守候数周
‎等待水牛大军的到来

translation.en: Eyes fixed on every shape crossing the horizon.
translation.zh:
‎一双双眼睛
‎密切关注着地平线上的每一个身影

translation.en: The approaching horde is a wall of horns and muscle.
translation.zh:
‎步步逼近的群落
‎正如一面弯角和肌肉组成的墙

translation.en: But the lions must find a weakness.
translation.zh: ‎但狮子必须找到其中的弱者

translation.en: And this could be it.
A lone bull.
He may be separate from the herd,
but he is four times heavier than a lion
translation.zh: ‎但水牛的体重比狮子重四倍

translation.en: and one of Africa's most dangerous animals.
translation.zh: ‎而且它还是非洲最凶猛的动物之一

translation.en: The pride must approach with care.
One by one, they casually walk towards him
translation.zh:
‎它们通常会漫不经心地
‎一个接一个走向水牛

translation.en: as if uninterested in a hunt.
In fact, they're falling into position.
translation.zh: ‎事实上 他们是在排兵走阵

translation.en: The females take it in turns to attack…
tiring the bull.
Now, the heavier males join the fight.
translation.zh: ‎此时 体重更胜一筹的雄性加入战斗

translation.en: The pride has honed their technique so well
that in just three minutes,
they have defeated their most formidable opponent.
The migration on which the lions depend
is one of millions driven by the seasons.
translation.zh: ‎只是数百万季节性迁徙的一个缩影

translation.en: And they, in turn,
are a consequence of another journey.
Our planet's year-long loop around the sun.
As it travels,
it does so on a tilt of 23 and a half degrees.
And it is this that creates our seasons.
translation.zh: ‎这种倾斜造就了不同的季节

translation.en: To understand how, keep your eye on the North Pole.
translation.zh:
‎想要了解其中原理
‎请将目光对准北极

translation.en: For half the year, it's angled away from the sun,
translation.zh: ‎这里每年有一半时间不受太阳照射

translation.en: bringing darkness and winter.
For the other half, it swings towards the sun,
bringing longer days.
It's this annual cycle
that drives the greatest movements of life on Earth.
translation.zh: ‎推动了地球上规模最大的生物大迁移

translation.en: And in the Northern Hemisphere, this brings the year's biggest change.
translation.zh:
‎而在北半球
‎它带来了一年中最大的变迁

translation.en: Spring.
In late March, the days lengthen faster than at any other time.
translation.zh:
‎三月下旬
‎昼时延长的速度快过其他任何时节

translation.en: Sunlight increases, quickly heating the land.
translation.zh: ‎日照增加 土地迅速升温

translation.en: Triggering rainstorms.
The Northern Hemisphere suddenly becomes warmer
and wetter.
Perfect for plants.
The land turns green.
And one animal exploits the boom in plant growth like no other.
translation.zh:
‎一种动物以无敌之势
‎尽享植物生长的繁荣

translation.en: A week ago,
this desert locust in Ethiopia
was a shy, solitary creature that moved very little.
translation.zh:
‎还只是一个怯生生和孤零零的小家伙
‎而且几乎不怎么动地方

translation.en: Not anymore.
When available food skyrockets,
locusts switch to swarm mode.
They start marching
and multiply ten times faster.
As their numbers explode,
they strip the land bare.
So to find more and more food,
they must keep moving.
The swarm grows.
And grows.
Devouring every plant in its path.
But this is just the start.
On foot, they can only move so far.
To go further,
they must change form.
They grow wings.
Now, with an even larger appetite,
the entire army takes to the sky.
They eat…
and fly.
Eat…
and fly.
They come together to form a super swarm.
translation.zh: ‎它们聚集一处 形成一只超级大军

translation.en: The biggest seen in 70 years.
200 billion strong.
If the whole swarm is to feed,
it must move further and faster.
It travels 100 kilometers
every single day.
It sweeps across country after country…
it even crosses the Red Sea.
translation.zh: ‎最令人震惊的是 ‎它们甚至横跨了红海

translation.en: It's the first time a swarm clears the Himalayas and reaches Tibet.
translation.zh:
‎这是首次有蝗群
‎飞跃喜马拉雅山脉 到达西藏

translation.en: Everywhere it goes,
it brings chaos.
It will keep moving until the changing seasons bring drought.
translation.zh:
‎蝗群不断迁移
‎直至季节更替 带来干旱

translation.en: For when their food finally disappears…
so will they.
In April, day length in the North continues to rise.
translation.zh: ‎四月 北半球白昼持续变长

translation.en: The increase in sunlight warms the oceans,
creating vast algal blooms
and a sudden abundance of food.
For one animal, this is the moment to travel.
translation.zh:
‎对一种动物而言
‎此时正是旅行的时机

translation.en: Midnight on a remote island off British Columbia.
translation.zh:
‎午夜 在不列颠哥伦比亚
‎离岸处的一座偏远岛屿

translation.en: Underground…
something stirs.
This ancient murrelet chick has only just hatched,
translation.zh:
‎这只幼年的扁嘴海雀
‎不久前刚刚破壳而出

translation.en: yet it's about to face the toughest journey it will ever make.
translation.zh: ‎但它即将经历一段无比艰辛的旅程

translation.en: She hasn't had her first meal
and urgently needs food.
Mum makes contact.
Across the island, hungry chicks emerge from their burrows
translation.zh: ‎岛上饥肠辘辘的雏鸟从洞穴钻出

translation.en: following their parents' calls.
But if they're expecting to eat now,
translation.zh: ‎可如果它们以为立马就有东西吃

translation.en: they're going to be disappointed.
This is the only seabird
that is fed exclusively at sea.
translation.zh: ‎完全在海上进行哺喂的海鸟

translation.en: The chicks just need to get there.
They can't yet fly,
so their only way to the ocean
is on foot.
While waiting till nightfall makes sense to avoid predators,
translation.zh:
‎尽管为了躲避天敌
‎选择趁夜赶路是明智之举

translation.en: it's a little harder to see where you're going.
And when you're barely bigger than a golf ball,
translation.zh:
‎况且 如果你的身型
‎只比高尔夫球大一点点

translation.en: anything can be an obstacle.
Their way may be blocked by the lowest of logs…
and the smallest of streams.
translation.zh: ‎再小的溪流 都可能挡住它们去路

translation.en: For some, the journey is over before it has even begun.
translation.zh: ‎一些雏鸟的征程尚未开始便已告终

translation.en: But not for this chick.
Finally, the beach.
And it's the last land it will touch for two years.
translation.zh:
‎这是它最后一次脚踏陆地
‎下一次就要等两年后了

translation.en: To find Mother,
it calls into the darkness.
Together again.
But the chick has still not eaten.
To reach the nearest food, they paddle nonstop
translation.zh:
‎为了到达距离最近的食源
‎它们片刻不停地划水

translation.en: for a remarkable 70 kilometers.
Here, Mother can finally dive
translation.zh: ‎到了这里 母亲终于可以潜入水下

translation.en: to collect the chick's first meal of krill.
translation.zh: ‎为雏鸟衔来第一顿磷虾美餐

translation.en: But this is just a pit stop.
The pair paddle a further thousand kilometers.
translation.zh: ‎它们还要继续划水上千公里

translation.en: It's a month-long migration to the rich northern seas
translation.zh:
‎此次迁徙耗时一个月
‎目标是到达富饶的北方海域

translation.en: where they can feast.
translation.zh: ‎在那里 它们可以尽享美食

translation.en: It's probably the longest journey made by any newly hatched bird.
translation.zh:
‎这大概是初生雏鸟
‎所经历过最为漫长的旅程

translation.en: And because the oceans are so productive in summer,
the murrelets can spend virtually their entire lives at sea.
translation.zh:
‎扁嘴海雀的整个生命历程
‎几乎都是在海上度过

translation.en: -[single piano key plays] -[metallic percussive sound reverberates]
1600 kilometers northwest of Hawaii
lies a remote speck of land,
Laysan.
Home to one of the world's largest seabirds.
translation.zh: ‎这里生活着全世界最大的海鸟之一

translation.en: The Laysan albatross.
This chick, six weeks old,
will become a supreme long-distance traveler…
translation.zh: ‎日后将成为一位杰出的长途旅者

translation.en: …flying millions of kilometers in its 60-year life.
translation.zh:
‎60年的生命时光中
‎它将飞行数百万公里

translation.en: Now, however, at four months old,
translation.zh: ‎不过现在 四个月大的它

translation.en: it's still flightless
and going nowhere.
Unlike the murrelet,
it depends on food being brought to it
by its parents.
But they could be fishing up to 3,000 kilometers away.
translation.zh: ‎但它们很可能在三千公里外捕鱼

translation.en: -So it may be waiting a while.
translation.zh: ‎所以它可能要等上好一阵子

translation.en: -[comical music playing] -Through pouring rain…
…blasting winds…
and baking heat.
Every bird crossing the horizon brings hope.
translation.zh: ‎每只飞过天边的鸟儿都会带来希望

translation.en: An albatross.
But the wrong kind.
A black-footed.
Though she has almost certainly brought food.
translation.zh: ‎不过 她十有八九也带回了食物

translation.en: Starving, the Laysan chick tries its luck.
translation.zh: ‎饥肠辘辘的莱桑雏鸟想试试运气

translation.en: Clearly, for this mother, it's family first.
translation.zh: ‎显然 对这位母亲而言 自家优先

translation.en: But what looks like a lifeline…
translation.zh: ‎不过 有些东西貌似救命

translation.en: …could be a death sentence.
Across the island, chicks are dying.
translation.zh: ‎放眼岛上 雏鸟正在死去

translation.en: There is now so much plastic in our oceans
that it reaches even the most remote islands on Earth.
translation.zh: ‎甚至被冲刷到地球上最为偏远的岛屿

translation.en: Carried here by the currents.
The parents mistake small floating pieces for food and bring it to their young,
translation.zh:
‎海鸟误将塑料漂浮物
‎当作食物带回给雏鸟

translation.en: accidentally killing them.
It's almost certain that every chick on the island has plastic in its stomach.
translation.zh:
‎几乎可以肯定
‎岛上的所有雏鸟胃里都有塑料

translation.en: Those that are fed too much starve to death.
translation.zh: ‎那些吃进太多塑料的会被活活饿死

translation.en: Laysan albatross are in the greatest danger.
translation.zh: ‎莱桑信天翁面临着巨大的危险

translation.en: They consume more plastic than any other seabird.
translation.zh: ‎它们往往比其他海鸟吃下更多塑料

translation.en: And it's getting worse each year.
At last, after nearly three weeks at sea…
translation.zh: ‎终于 在海上奔波近三周后…

translation.en: the chick's father returns.
Having spent so long apart,
they need to renew their bond.
This could be the last meal the chick is ever given.
translation.zh:
‎这可能是这只雏鸟
‎从父母那里获得的最后一餐

translation.en: And almost certainly contains plastic.
Its father returns to a life traveling the Pacific.
translation.zh:
‎父亲回归太平洋
‎继续纵横驰骋的生活

translation.en: And the chick is left to its fate.
But it's not over for him yet.
translation.zh: ‎不过 对他而言 一切还没有结束

translation.en: Albatrosses normally throw up hard-to-digest parts,
translation.zh: ‎信天翁通常会吐出难以消化的部分

translation.en: like squid beaks and bones.
Ejecting lighters and bottle caps, however, is more of a challenge.
translation.zh: ‎不过吐出打火机和瓶盖就费劲多了

translation.en: But this chick…
is a survivor.
And with that,
he is one step closer to takeoff.
In a few weeks, on the right wind,
translation.zh: ‎再过几周 待到顺风之时

translation.en: he will finally be able to make his big debut
translation.zh: ‎他将终能得以首次展露身手

translation.en: as one of the greatest ocean travelers.
translation.zh: ‎跻身最伟大的海洋旅行者之列

translation.en: The course of our tilted planet through space
translation.zh:
‎我们倾斜的星球
‎在太空中的运行轨迹

translation.en: affects one place more than any other.
translation.zh: ‎对一个地方的影响远胜于别处

translation.en: Summer in the North.
The Arctic now faces the sun
and is bathed in round-the-clock daylight,
melting an ocean covered in ice.
translation.zh: ‎照射融化覆盖着冰雪的海洋

translation.en: To survive in this shifting world,
translation.zh: ‎为了在不断变化的世界中求生

translation.en: life must move with it.
This young polar bear's home changes so much each year
translation.zh:
‎这只北极熊幼崽的家
‎每年都会发生巨大的变化

translation.en: that he can't keep to a limited territory.
translation.zh: ‎他无法留守在有限的领地之内

translation.en: Instead, he must roam for thousands of kilometers
in search of seals.
But every summer, as the ice begins to melt,
translation.zh: ‎然而 每年夏天 随着冰雪融化

translation.en: he must spend less time walking…
and more time swimming.
Now, for almost eight hours a day.
translation.zh: ‎如今 他每天要游近八个小时

translation.en: He can smell prey from 30 kilometers away.
So he knows that this bearded seal is nearby.
translation.zh: ‎所以他知道 这只髯海豹就在附近

translation.en: The seal is unaware of the danger.
And the bear needs to keep it that way.
translation.zh: ‎而北极熊正需要它继续蒙在鼓里

translation.en: The success rate of hunting from the water is very low.
Maybe third time will be lucky.
This young bear has yet to master the art of stalking from the sea.
translation.zh:
‎这只小北极熊
‎尚未掌握海上追踪的诀窍

translation.en: But it's important that he does.
He may have to rely on it more and more each year.
translation.zh: ‎一年年过去 它可能会越来越依赖它

translation.en: Our climate is warming.
And nowhere is this having a greater effect
than in the Arctic.
This year, the temperature climbs
to a staggering 38 degrees Celsius…
melting sea ice faster than ever.
translation.zh: ‎导致海冰以前所未有的速度融化

translation.en: And one Arctic animal is affected more than most.
translation.zh: ‎一种北极动物受此影响最大

translation.en: To feed,
walrus need a combination of a shallow seabed,
abundant clams,
and ice floes on which to rest.
But there are now fewer places to do so.
translation.zh: ‎然而 如今这样的地方已越来越少

translation.en: Making each summer more difficult than the last.
translation.zh:
‎这使得每年的夏季
‎都比上一年更加难熬

translation.en: Especially so for a new mother.
translation.zh: ‎对于刚做母亲的海象而言更是如此

translation.en: Three days ago, she had to leave the herd to give birth on her own.
translation.zh:
‎三天前
‎她不得不离开海象群独自生产

translation.en: And since then, she hasn't left her calf's side.
translation.zh: ‎从那之后 她一直守在小海象身边

translation.en: Nursing mothers need nearly twice as much food.
translation.zh:
‎哺育期的海象妈妈
‎所需的食物几乎是原来的两倍

translation.en: But they can't leave their calves alone while they themselves feed.
translation.zh: ‎但她们不能离开幼崽自己进食

translation.en: So she must go in search of others
translation.zh: ‎所以 她必须找寻其它海象

translation.en: to help her care for her young.
A newborn walrus is able to swim from day one.
But he's not yet strong enough to travel far.
translation.zh: ‎但他还不够强壮 无法远行

translation.en: So, for his first journey,
he hitches a ride.
With fewer ice floes each year,
they must swim further to find help.
translation.zh: ‎海象只能游到更远的地方寻求帮助

translation.en: And until then, his mother can't feed.
translation.zh:
‎而在求助成功之前
‎海象妈妈都无法进食

translation.en: Even when they do find others,
the ice must be low enough for the calf to climb out.
translation.zh:
‎还必须要有足够低矮的浮冰
‎让小海象能够爬上冰面

translation.en: Too high.
This looks just right.
But with suitable ice in short supply,
translation.zh: ‎然而 适宜的浮冰太过稀少

translation.en: space is very limited.
-It's not the welcome they needed. -[calf softly grunting]
translation.zh: ‎这并不是它们所需要的欢迎

translation.en: Even when there's enough ice,
without anyone to help, she is unable to feed
translation.zh: ‎没有帮手 海象妈妈依旧无法觅食

translation.en: and must stay with her calf.
Their search must go on.
The calf will depend on her for the next three years.
translation.zh:
‎在接下来的三年里
‎小海象都要依赖妈妈

translation.en: Wherever she goes,
they will go together.
In the next decade, the summer sea ice could disappear altogether.
translation.zh:
‎未来十年内
‎夏季海冰可能会完全消失

translation.en: If that happens,
even for the Arctic's most seasoned travelers,
translation.zh: ‎即便是北极最老练的旅行者

translation.en: there may be nowhere left to go.
In late June,
the North feels the full impact of the Earth's tilt
translation.zh: ‎北半球感受到地球倾斜的全面影响

translation.en: and receives more daylight than at any other time.
translation.zh: ‎日照量也到达一年中的顶峰

translation.en: And, in one corner of the Pacific,
this creates the greatest opportunity of the year.
translation.zh: ‎此时也是一年中的绝佳机会

translation.en: For six months,
Alaska's Bering Sea appears lifeless and empty.
translation.zh:
‎阿拉斯加的白令海
‎一直显得毫无生气 苍茫空虚

translation.en: Then, one day in June…
all that changes.
Humpback whales arrive
after a month-long voyage…
translation.zh: ‎经过历时一个月的旅程到达此处…

translation.en: for the biggest event in their calendar.
Thousands of them.
Across the Pacific,
other travelers are also on their way.
Sooty shearwaters race to get there in time…
translation.zh: ‎灰鹱日夜兼程 想要及时赶到…

translation.en: flying 1,000 kilometers a day nonstop.
The occasion is so important,
they come from the other side of the world.
translation.zh:
‎它们甚至不辞辛苦
‎从世界的另一边赶来

translation.en: At 65,000 kilometers,
it's the longest animal migration on Earth.
translation.zh: ‎这是地球上动物迁徙的最远航程

translation.en: A million of them join the whales.
translation.zh: ‎数百万只灰鹱加入鲸群的行列

translation.en: All have come to feed.
It's one of the greatest gatherings of life on Earth.
translation.zh: ‎这是地球上最为壮观的聚会之一

translation.en: Here, five months ago,
there were just seven hours of light a day.
translation.zh: ‎这里每日光照时间只有七小时

translation.en: Now, there are 17.
translation.zh: ‎而现在 光照时间长达17个小时

translation.en: The change triggers an explosion in the numbers of plankton and krill.
translation.zh:
‎这种变化
‎使得浮游生物和磷虾的数量激增

translation.en: For the whales, it may be the only time they feed in the entire year.
translation.zh:
‎对这些鲸鱼而言
‎这可能是一整年中唯一的饱餐机会

translation.en: Over the summer,
each scoops up 900 tons of food.
translation.zh: ‎每头鲸鱼收入腹中的食量可达900吨

translation.en: They all have just 90 days to eat as much as they can.
translation.zh: ‎它们只有90天时间可以尽情美餐

translation.en: Soon, the days will shorten
and bring an end to the great feast.
Then, every one of them will return south.
translation.zh: ‎到时 它们都将返回南方

translation.en: The opportunities brought by our tilted planet's journey
translation.zh: ‎地球的倾斜之旅所带来的种种良机

translation.en: can be enormous yet fleeting.
After a month of long summer days,
temperatures in the North Pacific are reaching their peak.
translation.zh: ‎北太平洋的温度已经达到最高峰

translation.en: An ocean predator detects the change
translation.zh: ‎海洋中一位捕食者察觉到了变化

translation.en: and sets a new course.
A tiger shark
on a thousand-kilometer odyssey across the Pacific.
translation.zh: ‎长途跋涉一千公里 横跨太平洋

translation.en: Guided by the Earth's magnetic field,
she swims in a straight line towards her target…
Laysan Island.
And she's not the only one.
This species makes some of the longest journeys of all sharks.
translation.zh:
‎这一物种经历了漫长的旅程
‎堪称鲨鱼迁徙的距离之最

translation.en: And hunts a bigger range of animals than any other.
translation.zh:
‎而且虎鲨猎食的动物
‎也比其他鲨鱼更加广泛

translation.en: Including even birds.
The Laysan albatross chick hasn't eaten
since he was abandoned by his parents two weeks ago.
translation.zh: ‎自两周前被父母抛下后 就再未进食

translation.en: To find food,
he must now leave the island.
But the world's largest seabirds need a lot of lift.
translation.zh:
‎但世界上最大的海鸟
‎起飞需要借助很大的风力

translation.en: That could come at any moment.
In July, the high ocean temperatures generate tropical storms at sea…
translation.zh:
‎七月 在高温作用下
‎海上会形成热带风暴…

translation.en: bringing wind to Laysan
and the young albatross a ticket out of here.
translation.zh: ‎也为信天翁雏鸟送来了离岛的旅票

translation.en: The breeze continues to build
until there's enough to lift even an albatross.
translation.zh: ‎甚至有足够的力量托起一只信天翁

translation.en: And the black-footed chicks are always first to go.
translation.zh: ‎黑脚信天翁的雏鸟总是率先起飞

translation.en: A chick's first flight is never a long one.
translation.zh: ‎雏鸟的第一次飞行向来不会长久

translation.en: And here, it's often their last.
translation.zh: ‎而在此处 这通常也是最后一次飞行

translation.en: The tiger sharks have arrived.
And they are very effective.
For the young albatross, it's not exactly encouraging.
translation.zh: ‎这让年幼的信天翁不免心生畏惧

translation.en: -But it's now… -[quirky dramatic music playing]
…or never.
If he reaches the open ocean,
he may not touch land again for five years.
But there is no room for error.
Time to throw caution to the wind.
Time to fly.
